channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Git Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Git Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-30947|2024-08-03T07:03:40.003Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git Plugin 4.11.1 and earlier allows attackers able to configure pipelines to check out some SCM repositories stored on the Jenkins controller's file system using local paths as SCM URLs, obtaining limited information about other projects' SCM contents.
